feed.title: Haogao Gu (顾豪高)
feed.subtitle: Postdoc fellow at The University of Hong Kong. Focusing on virus evolution and virus / host interactions.

entry.title: First blog: A new start
entry.content:
This is the first blog of this website.

The page is hosed on Github pages and was powered by jerkll. When building a this website, some reference pages were essential and were list below:

  • https://rayeren.github.io/
  • https://mmistakes.github.io/minimal-mistakes/about/
  • https://academicpages.github.io
entry.summary: This is the first blog of this website.
